general_info.summary: This list outlines various topics, including administrative and informational points like course fees, recruiter information, and COVID-19 updates. It also highlights specific university campuses (Uzbekistan and Agra) and educational programs, such as courses on human values and professional ethics, along with an international credit transfer program. Additionally, it mentions a national cybercrime reporting portal.
general_info.raw_content:
• Course Fee
• Recruiters
• Covid 19 Updates
• Sharda University Uzbekistan
• Sharda University Agra
• Courses on Human Values and Professional ethics
• National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal
• International Credit Transfer Programme
